title: PAYDAY 2 Online Incl. DLC and Updates v25.1-DiGiTALZONE
description:
PAYDAY 2 Online v25.1 [DiGiTALZONE]

Instructions:
1. Install
2. Play

NOTE: Do not install any cracks or fixes, everything is included already.

Features:
- Includes All Updates up to v25.1 [1.7.1] (Mar 21 2014)
- No Steam required
- All DLCs and Pre-Order content included
- Works Online/LAN/Offline
- PAYDAY 2 Online Client included

DLCs:
- PAYDAY 2: Career Criminal Content
- PAYDAY 2: Armored Transport
- PAYDAY 2: Gage Weapon Pack #01
- PAYDAY 2: The Charlie Santa Heist
- PAYDAY 2: A Merry Payday Christmas Soundtrack
- PAYDAY 2: Gage Weapon Pack #02

.....

PAYDAY 2 Online Client

Features:
- Update Delivery System, never worry about updates again
- No configuration
- Zero hassle, 100% tested and working
- Works through routers and NATs, no port forwarding required
- Online Lobby for support and chat
